quote: I am happy.I have something to accomplish, create, and achieve.I am happy.
author: Vera Nazarian,  The Perpetual Calendar of Inspiration

quote: I may never be happy, but tonight I am content.
author: Sylvia Plath,  The Unabridged Journals of Sylvia Plath

quote: Happy wife, happy life.
author: Paul Orfalea,  Copy This!: Lessons from a Hyperactive Dyslexic who Turned a Bright Idea Into One of America's Best Companies

quote: Are you happy?
author: Ray Bradbury,  Fahrenheit 451

quote: Be Sure To Notice When You're Happy
author: Brenda Farrar-ejemai

quote: Don't Worry Be Happy
author: Meher Baba

quote: Choose to be happy. It is what we have all done.
author: Melissa Marr,  Fragile Eternity

quote: Who’s happy? Happy is just what people think they are when they can’t find anything to bitch about.
author: Rasmenia Massoud,  Human Detritus

quote: If you want to be happy, be.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: Keep smiling, because life is a beautiful thing and there's so much to smile about.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: To be happy--one must find one's bliss
author: Gloria Vanderbilt

quote: Whoever is happy will make others happy.
author: Anne Frank,  The Diary of a Young Girl

quote: I'm happy. Which often looks like crazy.
author: David Henry Hwang,  M. Butterfly

quote: Whoever is happy will make others happy too.
author: Anne Frank

quote: Being in love, I find myself smiling for no reason at all...
author: Nicholas Sparks,  Dear John

quote: I need you to be happy. I need one of us to be happy.
author: Holly Black,  Red Glove

quote: Happy is the soul that has a friend. Happier is the soul that trusts in the truth of the heart of a friend. Happiest is the soul that knows the solemnity of friendship and honours its laws.
author: Ogwo David Emenike

quote: Nothing in the world can make you happy; everything in the world can encourage you to be happy
author: Robert Holden,  Happiness Now!: Timeless Wisdom for Feeling Good FAST

quote: You don’t have to be happy to smile.
author: Daniel Willey

quote: At any given moment the choice to be happy is present- we just have to choose to be happy.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: Being happy is of the utmost importance. Success in anything is through happiness.
author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quote: Everything's amazing right now, and nobody's happy.
author: Louis C.K.,  Untitled 1

quote: Happy girls are the prettiest
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: Happiness is part of who we are. Joy is the feeling
author: Tony DeLiso,  Legacy: The Power Within

quote: Happiness is an accident of nature, a beautiful and flawless aberration.
author: Pat Conroy,  The Lords of Discipline

quote: We are all happy if we but knew it.
author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky

quote: Happiness is a warm puppy.
author: Charles M. Schulz

quote: Be happy, but never satisfied.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: I'm generally a happy person -with the help of antidepressants, that is- so there is something to be said for surrounding myself with happy people.
author: Rachel Machacek,  The Science of Single: One Woman's Grand Experiment in Modern Dating, Creating Chemistry, and Finding L ove

quote: I think, to be happy is to be interested and engaged.
author: Aimee Mann

quote: I hope for happiness for you.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I am not good at noticing when I'm happy, except in retrospect.
author: Tana French,  In the Woods

quote: A sign of gratitude is a thankful smile.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Happiness had never been like this before. Now it came like sun showers, the sun and the rain together. Happiness was happier than it had been - sharp, piercing, and snatched, like a breath while swimming in surf.
author: Elizabeth Knox,  Dreamhunter

quote: The moment you stop chasing happiness, you become happy.
author: Sandy Hyatt-James

quote: To be happy, you have to risk being unhappy.
author: Ogwo David Emenike,  Happiness Recipe: Eat and Stay Happy

quote: Life's great happiness is to be convinced we are loved.
author: Victor Hugo,  Les Misérables

quote: You can't be happy unless you're unhappy sometimes".
author: Lauren Oliver,  Delirium

quote: I must learn to be content with being happier than I deserve.
author: Jane Austen,  Pride and Prejudice

quote: To be happy you must have taken the measure of your powers, tasted the fruits of your passion, and learned your place in the world.
author: George Santayana

quote: Is anyone anywhere happy?
author: Sylvia Plath,  The Unabridged Journals of Sylvia Plath

quote: It's a helluva start, being able to recognize what makes you happy.
author: Lucille Ball

quote: Oh, Marilla, I thought I was happy before. Now I know that I just dreamed a pleasant dream of happiness. This is the reality.
author: L.M. Montgomery,  Anne's House of Dreams

quote: There are two ways to be happy: improve your reality, or lower your expectations.
author: Jodi Picoult,  Nineteen Minutes

quote: Dear me! how happy and good we'd be, if we had no worries!
author: Louisa May Alcott,  Little Women

quote: Happiness is a state of activity.
author: Aristotle

quote: A happy wife is a happy life.
author: Gavin Rossdale

quote: Smile to be a flower of joy.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The key to knowing joy is being easily pleased.
author: Mark Nepo

quote: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.
author: Mahatma Gandhi
